docBody.p: Opponents of Birth Control are forcing the dysgenic birth rate by breeding from the bottom.
Their arguments can never effect the intelligent strata of our population.

It is the poor & ignorant over to whom they preach their doctrines--It is at their doors we must place the responsibility for a lowering intelligence infant & mothers deaths increase of abortions, child labor & a dysgenic birth rate.

While Bc has begun with the intelligent & middle & upper strata of our population It does not need to remain there. It is the object of the Bc Movement to burrow down into the lowest economic brackets.
I lay at the doors of our opponents the fact that with all our wealth & effort spent on maternal health we have not appreciably reduced our maternal death rate during the past 20 years!

We get aroused over the propaganda of the Communists--from Moscow We defend ourselves against the Ideology of the Natzis from Berlin, & the Fascists from Italy. But our opponents from Rome have put lulled Americans to sleep & arrogantly impose their benighted theology over a nation of 130 million.

Any race, creed or philosophy, or religion which preaches encourages directly or indirectly the increase of defectives, or prevents others from doing their intelligent duty to safe guard the State are the real Criminals & enemies of this Nation. We can defend ourselves against the Nazis, Communists, or Fascists because we are aroused & awakened to their ideas--But the menace of which after all would only effect our system of government or our external life--But of one of them the menace of the theology which forces the breeding & multiplication of the worst elements of one population causing national deterioration, slums, asylums child labor & infant & maternal deaths the increase of abortions & the general lowering of the Standards of life--Here is truly the Enemy & should be kept out of health & activities or deported
